title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: 200g spaghetti, 100g minced beef, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 400g canned tomatoes, 1 tbsp tomato paste, salt, pepper, olive oil
instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté chopped onion and garlic. 3. Add minced beef and cook until browned. 4. Stir in tomato paste and canned tomatoes. 5. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Simmer for 15 minutes. 7. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1 head romaine lettuce, 50g parmesan cheese, 100g croutons, Caesar dressing
instructions: 1. Grill the chicken breasts and slice them into strips. 2. Chop the romaine lettuce. 3. Toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing. 4. Top with chicken strips, croutons, and grated parmesan. 5. Serve immediately.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, 200g mozzarella cheese, 2 tomatoes, fresh basil, olive oil, salt
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C. 2. Roll out the pizza dough on a baking sheet. 3. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. 4. Arrange tomato slices on the dough. 5. Add mozzarella slices on top. 6. Season with salt and drizzle with olive oil. 7. Bake for 15 minutes. 8. Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: 8 taco shells, 300g ground beef, 1 onion, 1 tomato, lettuce, 100g cheddar cheese, taco seasoning, salsa
instructions: 1. Cook ground beef with taco seasoning in a pan. 2. Chop onion, tomato, and lettuce. 3. Fill taco shells with beef, vegetables, and cheese. 4. Top with salsa and serve.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Pancakes
ingredients: 200g flour, 2 eggs, 300ml milk, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, butter
instructions: 1. In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder. 2. Add eggs and milk, whisk until smooth. 3. Heat a pan and melt butter. 4. Pour batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form. 5. Flip and cook the other side. 6. Serve with syrup or toppings of choice.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: 200g fettuccine, 2 chicken breasts, 200ml heavy cream, 100g parmesan cheese, 2 garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Cook fettuccine according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic. 3. Add sliced chicken breasts and cook until golden. 4. Pour in heavy cream and grated parmesan. 5. Stir until cheese is melted and sauce thickens. 6. Season with salt and pepper. 7. Toss fettuccine with the sauce and serve.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, 1 broccoli, 1 carrot, 100g snow peas, soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, ginger
instructions: 1. Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces. 2. Heat sesame oil in a wok and add minced garlic and ginger. 3. Stir-fry vegetables until tender-crisp. 4. Add soy sauce and stir to coat. 5. Serve with rice or noodles.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: 200g flour, 200g sugar, 100g cocoa powder, 2 eggs, 100ml milk, 100ml vegetable oil, 1 tsp baking powder, 1 tsp vanilla extract
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder in a bowl. 3. Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. 4. Beat until smooth. 5. Pour batter into a greased cake tin. 6. Bake for 25-30 minutes. 7. Let cool before serving.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: 1 cucumber, 2 tomatoes, 100g feta cheese, 50g olives, 1 red onion, olive oil, oregano, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion. 2. Crumble feta cheese. 3. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. 4. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano, salt, and pepper. 5. Toss and serve.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: French Toast
ingredients: 4 slices bread, 2 eggs, 100ml milk, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tbsp sugar, butter, syrup
instructions: 1. Beat eggs with milk, sugar, and cinnamon. 2. Dip bread slices into the egg mixture, coating both sides. 3. Heat butter in a pan and cook bread until golden on both sides. 4. Serve with syrup.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 300g beef strips, 1 onion, 200g mushrooms, 100ml sour cream, 1 tbsp flour, butter, salt, pepper, egg noodles
instructions: 1. Cook egg noodles according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, melt butter and sauté chopped onion. 3. Add beef strips and cook until browned. 4. Stir in sliced mushrooms and cook until tender. 5. Sprinkle with flour and stir. 6. Add sour cream and simmer until thickened. 7. Season with salt and pepper. 8. Serve over egg noodles.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: 200g Arborio rice, 100g mushrooms, 1 onion, 100ml white wine, 500ml chicken broth, 50g parmesan cheese, butter, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. In a pan, melt butter and sauté chopped onion. 2. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until tender. 3. Stir in Arborio rice and cook for 2 minutes. 4. Pour in white wine and stir until absorbed. 5. Gradually add chicken broth, stirring constantly, until rice is cooked. 6. Stir in grated parmesan. 7. Season with salt and pepper. 8. Serve immediately.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: 2 tomatoes, 200g mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. 2. Arrange slices on a plate, alternating tomato and mozzarella. 3. Garnish with fresh basil leaves. 4. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. 5. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve as a starter or side dish.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: 200g shrimp, 100g linguine, 2 garlic cloves, 50ml white wine, lemon juice, butter, parsley, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Cook linguine according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic. 3. Add shrimp and cook until pink. 4. Pour in white wine and lemon juice. 5. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Toss shrimp with linguine. 7. Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Vegetarian Chili
ingredients: 1 can kidney beans, 1 can black beans, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 onion, 1 bell pepper, 2 garlic cloves, chili powder, cumin, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. In a pot, sauté chopped onion, bell pepper, and minced garlic. 2. Add beans and diced tomatoes. 3. Season with chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper. 4. Simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Serve with rice or bread.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: BBQ Chicken Wings
ingredients: 12 chicken wings, BBQ sauce, salt, pepper, garlic powder
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 200°C. 2. Season chicken wings with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. 3. Place wings on a baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes. 4. Brush wings with BBQ sauce and bake for another 10 minutes. 5. Serve hot.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: 500g tomatoes, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 500ml vegetable broth, olive oil, basil, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté chopped onion and garlic. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes. 3. Pour in vegetable broth and simmer for 15 minutes. 4. Blend the soup until smooth. 5. Season with salt, pepper, and basil. 6. Serve with bread.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: 4 slices bread, 100g cheddar cheese, butter
instructions: 1. Butter one side of each bread slice. 2. Place cheese between two slices, buttered sides out. 3. Heat a pan and cook sandwich until golden on both sides. 4. Serve hot.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 200g spaghetti, 100g pancetta, 2 eggs, 50g parmesan cheese, black pepper, salt
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. 3. In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated parmesan. 4. Toss spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat. 5. Quickly stir in egg mixture. 6. Season with black pepper and salt. 7. Serve immediately.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 200g flour, 100g butter, 100g sugar, 100g chocolate chips, 1 egg, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1 tsp baking soda, salt
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Cream together butter and sugar. 3. Beat in egg and vanilla extract. 4. Mix in flour, baking soda, and a pinch of salt. 5. Stir in chocolate chips. 6. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet. 7. Bake for 10-12 minutes. 8. Let cool before serving.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Tuna Salad
ingredients: 1 can tuna, 1 cucumber, 1 tomato, 1 red onion, 50g olives, 2 tbsp mayonnaise, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Drain tuna and flake with a fork. 2. Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion. 3. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. 4. Stir in mayonnaise. 5. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve chilled.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Apple Pie
ingredients: 200g flour, 100g butter, 100g sugar, 4 apples, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tbsp lemon juice
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Prepare pie crust with flour, butter, and sugar. 3. Peel and slice apples. 4. Toss apples with cinnamon and lemon juice. 5. Fill pie crust with apple mixture. 6. Cover with top crust and seal edges. 7. Bake for 45 minutes. 8. Serve warm.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Crispy Fried Chicken
ingredients: 8 chicken drumsticks, 200g flour, 2 eggs, 100ml milk, salt, pepper, paprika, oil for frying
instructions: 1. Season chicken with salt, pepper, and paprika. 2. Dredge chicken in flour, dip in beaten eggs, then coat with flour again. 3. Heat oil in a deep pan. 4. Fry chicken until golden and cooked through. 5. Drain on paper towels and serve.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Eggplant Parmesan
ingredients: 2 eggplants, 200g mozzarella cheese, 100g parmesan cheese, 500ml marinara sauce, 100g flour, 2 eggs, breadcrumbs, olive oil
instructions: 1. Slice eggplants and dredge in flour, beaten eggs, and breadcrumbs. 2. Fry eggplant slices in olive oil until golden. 3. In a baking dish, layer marinara sauce, eggplant, and cheeses. 4. Repeat layers and finish with cheese on top. 5. Bake at 180°C for 25-30 minutes. 6. Serve hot.
author: Nikola Gilev

title: Lasagna
ingredients: 200g lasagna noodles, 300g ground beef, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 500ml marinara sauce, 200g mozzarella cheese, 100g parmesan cheese, ricotta cheese, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions. 3. In a pan, sauté onion and garlic, add ground beef and cook until browned. 4. Stir in marinara sauce and simmer. 5. In a baking dish, layer noodles, meat sauce, ricotta, and cheeses. 6. Repeat layers and finish with cheese on top. 7. Bake for 25-30 minutes. 8. Let cool slightly before serving.
author: Nikola Gilev
